Name: Rackspace - Update Load Balancer
Description: Change the condition of a node in a Rackspace Cloud Load Balancer.

Parameters.Name: ApiKey
Parameters.Label: API key
Parameters.HelpText: Rackspace control panel user API key

Parameters.Name: LoadBalancerID
Parameters.Label: Load Balancer ID
Parameters.HelpText: ID of the load balancer, found on the details page in the Rackspace control panel

Parameters.Name: NodeIpAddress
Parameters.Label: Node IP address
Parameters.HelpText: IP address of load balanced node. Found on the load balancer details page of the Rackspace control panel

Parameters.Name: NewCondition
Parameters.Label: New Node Condition
Parameters.HelpText: Condition to set the node to. Can either be 'ENABLED', 'DISABLED' or 'DRAINING'
